verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
(men and women in canon)
Hold me, Lord, in Your arms,
Fill me Lord, with Your Spirit.
Touch my heart with Your love,
Let my life
Glorify Your name. (All)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Singing, Alleluia,
Singing, Alleluia,
Singing, Alleluia,
Singing, Alleluia.
Alleluia, (Alleluia,)
Allelu, (Allelu,)
Alleluia, (Alleluia,)
Allelu, (Allelu.)
